page.title: 04LONGFORGAN - ROSSIE ESTATE -
page.content: The estate is owned by the Kinnaird family. Lord and Lady Kinnaird reside at Rossie Priory and they have four daughters. The estate provides regular employment for 16 people and there are 30 let houses. The farmland within the policy wall, together with Lochspout and Dron Farms, are farmed by a family partnership. Enterprises include wheat,barley,potatoes,oil seed rape, beef cattle and breeding ewes. Millhill Farm is let to Mr Pat Stewart who grows strawberries,raspberries,and gooseberries as well as cereals. The woodlands are mixed hardwood and conifer. The hardwoods,Ash,Oak,Beech and Sycamore are self-regenerated in the main. The sportings are let yearly to a shooting syndicate who put down up to 3000 pheasants. The cricket club also enjoys the rural environs of the estate and picturesque surroundings.
